description:
Designer & management software for xTool laser cutters & engravers.


Software & Editor Updates
1. Powerful Layers: Supports up to 16 layers with numeric identification. Improves organization for complex designs and enhances accessibility.
2. Text Upgrade: Text now supports RTL languages (e.g., Arabic) and vertical layout.
3. Personalized Couple Swing SVG Generator: Easily turn images into hanging silhouette decor.
4. Material Grid Test Upgrade: Supports bitmap images for automatic grid testing.
5. Enhanced Batch Processing:
- Smart Numbering: Auto-increment sequences with customizable prefixes and suffixes.
- Batch Coding: Generate QR codes and barcodes in bulk.
- Data Merge: Automatically match and populate designs with data from external spreadsheets.
6. New Languages Supported: Indonesian, Malay, and Vietnamese.
------
Device Updates
1. Improved Device Management: Faster discovery, one-click switching, and manual device removal or disconnection.
2. RA3 now supports F1 Ultra and F2 Ultra.
3. F2 Ultra UV 3D Photo Enhanced: Significantly improved 3D textures in Inner Engraving mode, with automatic depth optimization for sharper results.
4. MetalFab-SaveGasâ„¢ (Beta): Automatically detects idle movements and shuts off gas to reduce consumption while maintaining processing quality.
------
Bug Fixes
1. Fixed calibration page display issues on F2 Ultra UV screens.
2. Fixed an issue where the coordinate panel incorrectly displayed "Mixed" for nodes aligned on the same axis during node editing.
3. Fixed missing textures when importing AI-generated 3D models.
4. Fixed other known bugs.
